  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es diu "tinc fred", "tinc calor" o "tinc por" ?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you say "I'm cold", "I'm hot", or "I'm afraid" in English?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie sagen Sie "mich sind kalt", "ich bin" heiß, 
oder "ich habe" auf englisch Angst?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment me dites-vous "suis-vous froid", est-ce 
que "je suis chaud", ou "j'ai peur" en anglais ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você me diz "está frio", "eu estou quente",
ou "eu estou receoso" em inglês?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come lo dite "sono freddi", "sono caldo", o "sono 
impaurito" in inglese?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς λέτε ότι "είμαι κρύοσ", "είμαι καυτόσ", ή 
"εγώ είναι φοβισμένοσ" στα αγγλικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) mitjançant la qual es pot consultar la manera de dir en anglès alguns estats de salut, d'ànim o físics, tot comparant-los amb la llengua catalana i evitant possibles interferències.
S'hi ofereix la resposta amb la possibilitat d'imprimir-la.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on how to talk about our state of health or mood in English and comparing the corresponding phrases in Catalan with the aim of avoiding inter-language interference. The answer can be printed out.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">competència comunicativa</string>
            <string language="en">communicative competence</string>
            <string language="es">competencia comunicativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">salut</string>
            <string language="en">health</string>
            <string language="es">salud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, wie man mit
unserem Gesundheitszustand oder Stimmung in englischem und im 
Vergleichen der entsprechenden Phrasen auf katalanisch mit dem Ziel 
des Vermeidens von von Inter-languagestörung befaßt. Die 
Antwort kann ausgedruckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la façon dont parler 
de notre état de santé ou d'humeur et en comparant les expressions 
correspondantes dans le catalan au but d'éviter l'interférence 
d'interlangue. La réponse peut être imprimée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em como falar sobre nosso 
estado de saúde ou de modo em inglês e em comparar as frases 
correspondentes no catalan com o alvo de evitar a interferência do 
inter-language. A resposta pode printed-out.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su come parlare del nostro 
dichiarano di salute o dell'umore in inglese e paragonare le 
frasi corrispondenti nel catalan allo scopo di evitare l'interferenza 
di inter-language. La risposta può essere stampata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο πώς να μιλήσει για την 
κατάστασή μας υγείας ή διάθεσης στα αγγλικά και τη σύγκριση των
αντίστοιχων φράσεων στα καταλανικά με το στόχο inter-language 
την παρέμβαση. Η απάντηση μπορεί να εκτυπωθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mitteilsame Kompetenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compétence communicative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">santé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">competence communicative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">saúde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">competenza comunicativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
